Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook.models.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all attributes of the book object.

    1.1
    Author:
    CMPUT 301 Team 14

      • status

        public java.lang.String status()
        Returns the status for the book. * Owners can see AVAILABLE or BORROWED. * Users can see AVAILABLE, BORROWED, ACCEPTED or REQUESTED. Most of the time, the status should be AVAILABLE.
        Returns:
        status
